location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 215 x 570mm, on sheet 233 x 593mm

mods.abstract: The plan accompanies MILITARY REPORT on PERSIA Vol. IV Part I. and shows a station yard at Duzdap [Zahedan] in eastern Persia, indicating railway lines, sidings and buildings.The plan has been corrected up to 31 March 1920, and bears a printing statement which reads 'Simla Drawing Office. No. 3253, March 1922.'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
